resources.string: Thank you for crash testing Onosendai. Please email a bug report.

Onosendai is not currently configured. \n This will help you get started by generating an initial configuration for you that you can customise. Please keep in mind that this is still an ALPHA product and configuration is mostly a manual process. \n Select an action from the list below.
Sign in to Twitter and authorise Onosendai to access your account.

This will import your existing layout from SuccessWhale (SW). For this to you work you must have a SW account with a password configured. \n If you do not have an SW username and password please now go and create one.

This is an advanced option and requires you to manage a JSON file. 
 This will generate you an example configuration file for you to fill in. After this file has been created you must go and edit it in text editor. Once it is ready return to this screen to import its content. 
 The configuration file will be written to: 
 ${conf_path}

It looks like you have created a configuration file. 
 Use this option to validate that configration file and import its content. 
 Configuration will be read from: 
 ${conf_path}
